title: Pixel 1 shuts down without any warning with 50% battery. Android 9.0.
content:
Pixel 1 (2 years old) shuts off on 50% battery. 
Android 9.0 pie. Problem occurred in november or december.
I tried factory reset but problem persists.
Do I have to change the battery or there will be update to fix it? Did anyone have same problem? Anyone found fix?
